ðŸ“– Summary: Depyler is a Python-to-Rust transpiler that aims to facilitate the transition from Python to Rust by converting annotated Python code into idiomatic Rust. It focuses on semantic verification and memory safety analysis to ensure the generated Rust code preserves the original program's behavior while providing compile-time safety guarantees.
